tweet: I think one of the biggest reasons $LINK is outperforming the market is that it has a large community of very loyal, long term investors. You only get a sustained run when your community is filled with long term investors. Traders will PnD it and move on. That's how runs end.

A couple of thoughts I had for the $LINK community  - Stay focused on fundamentals over price - Continue to research - MainNet/Nodes are the big near term goals - Start charting predominately in LINK/USD - Don't get cocky & turn potential newcomers off - Keep the meme game strong

People are going to say that we were "lucky" to have bought $LINK early. Little do they know how much time and energy we've spent researching, studying, analysing, collaborating, critiquing, and of course meming about ChainLink  https://t.co/QfnxBGkyKe

Town Crier and Chainlink: Enriching and Extending the Possibilities of Oracles 🔮  by Cornell U professor, Ari Juels @AriJuels @chainlink @cornell_tech @initc3org   #TownCrier #Chainlink #Oracles #Blockchain  https://t.co/jpFRGE2JI1  https://t.co/jLuimN4RX8

XRP the standard? Maybe just for banking. @ChainLink will be the standard decentralized oracle for all smart contracts meaning it will be used in ANY industry that wants to leverage smart contracts and DLT #ChainLink $LINK $FOSS  https://t.co/b4RRwMzpBE

$LINK will soon go parabolic, if you think this was a run then you'd be surprised at how much it can go further. I'd recommend all traders just go with the flow here and not think about pullbacks. The upside is far greater than the downside. $BTC $ETH

Re: LINK/USD -  I see people ask “how can $LINK reach ath around $1.50 soon when we’re only at $0.48 now?”  Quite simply, there’s very little friction above $0.60, and once cleared, price can move rapidly.   🦆🦆🦆🦆  https://t.co/EqNnV1U0Al
